TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XPathNamespaceScope extends System.Enum

remarks.format: ## Remarks The XPathNamespaceScope enumeration can be passed to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirstNamespace%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class to specify the type of namespace node to move to.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope All = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Returns all namespaces defined in the scope of the current node. This includes the `xmlns:xml` namespace which is always declared implicitly. The order of the namespaces returned is not defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope ExcludeXml = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Returns all namespaces defined in the scope of the current node, excluding the `xmlns:xml` namespace. The `xmlns:xml` namespace is always declared implicitly. The order of the namespaces returned is not defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope Local = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Returns all namespaces that are defined locally at the current node.
